lead_paragraph: Three months after losing his dream job as England manager, Sam Allardyce was back in football on Friday and facing a familiar task: Keeping a struggling team in the Premier League.

headline.print_headline: Ex-England Coach Allardyce Hired as Crystal Palace Manager
headline.main: Ex-England Coach Allardyce Hired as Crystal Palace Manager
